name: Sanctuary (benmorris)
description:
A cute little procedural Terrain, City & Traffic builder.

  • Use the in-game editor to define the rules for creating your grass, rocks, trees, city and traffic
  • Walk and fly around your creation
  • More features (and gameplay) coming soon...
  • Release notes are here.

Purchasing helps support the project's continued development and gives you access to all future updates - many thanks for your support :-)

If you have any issues then contact me by email: ben@fireflytech.org
